00006 #include <stdio.h>

00009 #include <arrayfunctions.h>
00010 #include <firstderivative.h>

00012 #include <mpivars.h>
00013 #include <hypar.h>
00014 typedef MPIVariables  MPIContext;
00015 typedef HyPar         SolverContext;

00017 #ifdef with_omp
00018 #include <omp.h>

00020 
00036 int FirstDerivativeSecondOrderCentral(
00037                                         double  *Df,  
00038                                         double  *f,   
00040                                         int     dir,  
00041                                         int     bias, 
00043                                         void    *s,   
00044                                         void    *m    
00045                                      )
00046 {
00047   SolverContext *solver = (SolverContext*) s;
00048   int           i, j, v;
00049 
00050   int ghosts = solver->ghosts;
00051   int ndims  = solver->ndims;
00052   int nvars  = solver->nvars;
00053   int *dim   = solver->dim_local;
00054 
00055 
00056   if ((!Df) || (!f)) {
00057     fprintf(stderr, "Error in FirstDerivativeSecondOrder(): input arrays not allocated.\n");
00058     return(1);
00059   }
00060 
00061   /* create index and bounds for the outer loop, i.e., to loop over all 1D lines along
00062      dimension "dir"                                                                    */
00063   int indexC[ndims], index_outer[ndims], bounds_outer[ndims];
00064   _ArrayCopy1D_(dim,bounds_outer,ndims); bounds_outer[dir] =  1;
00065   int N_outer; _ArrayProduct1D_(bounds_outer,ndims,N_outer);
00066 
00067 #pragma omp parallel for schedule(auto) default(shared) private(i,j,v,index_outer,indexC)
00068   for (j=0; j<N_outer; j++) {
00069     _ArrayIndexnD_(ndims,j,bounds_outer,index_outer,0);
00070     _ArrayCopy1D_(index_outer,indexC,ndims);
00071     /* left boundary */
00072     for (i = -ghosts; i < -ghosts+1; i++) {
00073       int qC, qR, qRR;
00074       indexC[dir] = i  ; _ArrayIndex1D_(ndims,dim,indexC,ghosts,qC );
00075       indexC[dir] = i+1; _ArrayIndex1D_(ndims,dim,indexC,ghosts,qR );
00076       indexC[dir] = i+2; _ArrayIndex1D_(ndims,dim,indexC,ghosts,qRR);
00077       for (v=0; v<nvars; v++)  Df[qC*nvars+v] = 0.5 * (-3*f[qC*nvars+v]+4*f[qR*nvars+v]-f[qRR*nvars+v]);
00078     }
00079     /* interior */
00080     for (i = -ghosts+1; i < dim[dir]+ghosts-1; i++) {
00081       int qC, qL, qR;
00082       indexC[dir] = i  ; _ArrayIndex1D_(ndims,dim,indexC,ghosts,qC );
00083       indexC[dir] = i-1; _ArrayIndex1D_(ndims,dim,indexC,ghosts,qL);
00084       indexC[dir] = i+1; _ArrayIndex1D_(ndims,dim,indexC,ghosts,qR);
00085       for (v=0; v<nvars; v++)  Df[qC*nvars+v] = 0.5 * (f[qR*nvars+v]-f[qL*nvars+v]);
00086     }
00087     /* right boundary */
00088     for (i = dim[dir]+ghosts-1; i < dim[dir]+ghosts; i++) {
00089       int qLL, qL, qC;
00090       indexC[dir] = i-2; _ArrayIndex1D_(ndims,dim,indexC,ghosts,qLL);
00091       indexC[dir] = i-1; _ArrayIndex1D_(ndims,dim,indexC,ghosts,qL );
00092       indexC[dir] = i  ; _ArrayIndex1D_(ndims,dim,indexC,ghosts,qC );
00093       for (v=0; v<nvars; v++)  Df[qC*nvars+v] = 0.5 * (3*f[qC*nvars+v]-4*f[qL*nvars+v]+f[qLL*nvars+v]);
00094     }
00095   }
00096   
00097   return(0);
00098 }
